privacy.title: Respectful of privacy
privacy.description: No ads, no trackers, no data reselling. Your data remains yours, not ours. Your data remains encrypted at all times, and only you hold the keys.

oss.title: Transparent source code
oss.description: The code for all our software is open, free, and free to use. You can download, modify, and use it without paying any royalties.

selfhost.title: Self-hosted services
selfhost.description: If you don't want to trust us, you can host our services yourself. Without losing a single feature and while remaining connected to other instances.

scroll.data_master: Be in control of your data, yes.
scroll.keep_secret: Who better than you to keep your secrets?
